title: ⭐ Amusement Club ⭐ Card Game
description:
Welcome! You already have **300 🍅 Tomatoes**! Use `->claim` to get cards.
You can call `->daily` every **20** hours and get free tomatoes.
Earn tomatoes from typing and completing `->quests` that you get with `->daily`!

title: About card craft/forge
description: This command allows you to get new cards using cards that you have. Forge will consume old cards. There are two types of forge, however: *Ordinary cards forge* and *Craft cards forge*

fields.title: Ordinary cards forge
fields.description: Can be used to forge simple non-craft cards. You can convert two 1-star cards into 2-star card, four 1-star cards (or two 2-star cards) into 3-star card. New card is completely random, except that if cards that you use for forging are from the same collection (fandom). In this case new card will be also from same collection. Ordinary forge costs 120 Tomatoes for 1-star cards and 240 Tomatoes for 2-star.

fields.title: Craft cards forge
fields.description: Used when all cards in arguments are craft cards. You have to combine certain cards in order to get a special effect card, that will be added to your inventory. This special card provides valuable effect. If you get a special *craft card*, try using part of it name to find info (e.g. `->forge info tohru`).

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
You can’t combine ordinary and craft card
You can’t combine cards of different level
Minimum amount of cards is 2
Craft cards usually contain part of effect card name

title: About crystals
description: In **Christmas event** you can get 1-2 star cards using `->claim promo`. However, 3+ star cards can be recieved only by forging **crystals**

fields.title: Get crystals
fields.description: Forge 2-star cards or 1-star cards and get different crystals. Depending on overall star amount in forge request you will get crystal with higher value. You can find your crystals in **inventory** (`->inv`)

fields.title: Forge crystals to get new cards
fields.description:
Once you have some crystals, forge them like this (example)
`->forge *red, *green, *blue` and get a higher value card. If you were the first one to forge this card with those crystals, you will assign your own **crystal recipe** to it. Once someone uses your recipe to get this card, you will get extra **snowflakes**. Read more: `->help recipe`

fields.title: Order and value matters!
fields.description:
Depending on order of crystals and their value, you get different recipes. Cyan and Magenta crystals will give you 100% 3-star card and some chance to get a 4-star. Gold crystal is 100% 4-star card. To get christmas legendary, you have to forge 3 platinum crystals.
**NOTE** that legendary becomes available in first couple of days after christmas. It will be announced separately

title: About recipe
description: Recipe allows you to craft card that you want. Following certain crystal pattern you can forge you favourite card

title: About inventory
description: Inventory contains different items that cam be used in game. For example, effect cards (from v1.9.0), claim tickets (from v2.0), etc. Items can be stored unlimited amount of time. Some items provide effect if they are in user’s inventory, some of them should be used.

fields.title: See the list of your items

title: About leaderboards
description: Provides a list of players, who have most stars (from cards) Globally or Locally. Card duplicates are not counted.

title: About hero
description:
Hero is a character with certain set of abilities that help you in the game. You can get hero for free after you get more than 50 ⭐. You can get your amount of stars by running `->bal`.
Hero change costs 2000 🍅 Tomatoes and resets hero level. To change hero without losing your level, purchase a hero change ticket from `->store` (from v2.0).
Hero gets XP if you are active. Hero level unlocks certain effect cards and also gives more `->daily` 🍌 Bananas (from v2.0)

fields.title: Hero club (from v2.0)
fields.description: Special for TOP-5 heroes that are chosen every 1st day of month. Members get different daily bonuses and increased *reputation points* (from v1.9.7)

title: About bot statistics
description: Provides information about server/players/cards

title: About card claiming
description: You can claim cards as long as you have enough 🍅 Tomatoes. Claim costs start at 50 tomatoes and increase by 50 each claim. The claim cost goes back to minimum after running `->daily`.

fields.title: Locked claims
fields.description: If the server you are claiming on is related to specific fandom/series, that means that only one collection is used for claiming. However, you can always try and claim among all available cards for the bot. Use `->claim any` for that

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
This command can be executed only in bot channel (`->help channel` for more info)
Claim cost can be different for certain *heroes*
Some *effect cards* can reduce claim cost
The message above card shows cost of your next claim and can also include important information about the card

fields.title: Get a random card (can be locked)

title: About card summon
description:
You can summon card in any channel on server, but only if you have this card. This operation won't consume card.
You can include partial name of the card, but it has to be more than 3 characters long. The system will try to find *most suitable card* using name you provided

title: About daily bonus
description: You can get free **100🍅** Tomatoes every 20 hours. This command will also reset your `->claim` cost and give **2 quests**

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
New players get 300🍅 bonus
The daily bonus can be different for certain heroes
*Effect cards* and *Hero Club* can change daily bonus

title: About card pricing
description: Bot evaluates card value depending on amount of stars, type and amount users that already have it. This is really useful to know the market price of item when trading it.

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
You can use any filters for card search, except `-multi`
Bot uses those values to determine your **give/get ratio** (read more in `->help trade`)

title: About currencies
description:
This command will show your amount of 🍅 Tomatoes ⭐ Stars and 🍌 Bananas (from v2.0).
**Tomatoes** is a main currency in game, that is used for card `->claim`, trading, forging, etc. You can get them by completing `->quests` and claiming `->daily`
**Stars** show you overall (clean) sum of card stars that you have. This is used mostly for rating and some benefits, like *heroes*
**Bananas** (from v2.0) is a currency used in `->store` to get special items and *premium*. Daily bonus gives Bananas depending on hero level

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
You can `->pay` tomatoes to other people
`->bal` shows 'clean' amount of stars, that means that those are no affected by any hero abilities.
You can't transfer Bananas.

title: About __card__ sending
description:
You can send cards to other users. Note, that this command has no confirmation, so it will send best matched card at once. To make sure, that you will send the correct card, type full card name, or summon it first to check if the name is correct.
**Since v1.9.8 bot has trading limits. To see them run `->help trade`**

title: About trading rules
description:
**Since v1.9.10** limit to daily trading was added. After sending 15 cards, user will have to pay an increasing **100 tomatoes fee**. User who got 15 cards can't recieve more. You can get amount of cards send with `->ratio`, this statistics resets after you run `->daily`
**Since v1.9.8** Amusement Club has limits to user trading. In order to keep card balance between users the **give/get ratio system** was implemented. When you send or get cards, Amusement Club will count your send/receive (officially give/get or g/g) ratio. If you send or receive too many cards, trading will be blocked. The g/g ratio is calculated from card value. You can get card value by running `->eval [card query]`

fields.title: Ratio is higher than 2.5
fields.description: You sent too many cards and have to get more cards or tomatoes from other users

fields.title: Ratio is lower than 0.4
fields.description: You got too many cards from users. Feel free to thank them with tomatoes or by sending other cards

fields.title: Send Tomatoes
fields.description: Get the cost of the card by running `->eval [card query]`

fields.title: Daily won't reset your ratio
fields.description: `->daily` won't reset G/G ratio, however it will improve ratio a little. First 2 sends a day that are not included into g/g calculation

title: About __tomato__ sending
description: You can send tomatoes to other users. Usually this is used as a part of trade deal between users.

title: About card listing
description: Gets your cards and shows it in several pages. If you have a long card list, use *card filters* to show only cards that you are interested in. See the filters below.

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
You can combine any filters in any order. If no cards found, bot will tell you that
To see all collections, run `->stats cards`

fields.title: Show only cards from some collection
Show only cards with certain amount of stars
Show cards that has keyword in the name

title: About cards selling
description:
Sell cards that you don't need. You get:
300🍅 for 3🌟 card, 150🍅 for 2🌟 and 80🍅 for 1🌟
Note, that this command has no confirmation, so it will sell best matched card at once. To make sure, that you will sell correct card, type full card name, or summon it first to check if the name is correct

title: Adding cards to favorites
description: You can add any card to favorites. That kind of card can't be sent and it won't show up for other users in `->has` or `->diff` commands, unless you have 2 or more of those cards

title: Card query
description:
In the help messages you will often see `[card query]`. But what does it mean?
 In Amusement Club you can get cards in any request type (except `forge`) by using different card parameters. Those parameters can be also combined

title: About difference
description: Difference is very useful command for trading, that will show you cards that certain user has and you not. It can accept same set of filters as `->cards` command

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
You can combine any filters in any order.
To see all collections, run `->stats cards`

fields.title: Show only cards from some collection
Show only cards with certain amount of stars
Show cards that has keyword in the name

title: About quests
description: Quests are small daily tasks that players get after running `->daily` command. Usually you will get 2 different quests (that might be different depending on your hero).

title: Know if user has a card
description: This little useful command will try to find if user has certain card by name. It is useful, when you need to transfer card and would like to make sure target user doesn't have it already.

title: About updates
description: This command provides list of latest updates for the bot. This is always useful to check for latest changes to not make mistakes and lose tomatoes! For more details and update notifications, join [Bot Discord](https://discord.gg/kqgAvdX)

title: About bot channels
description: Amusement Club is a discord bot that can read commands from any channel. However, there are some limitations

fields.title: Any channel
fields.description: You can `->summon` cards and call `->help`. Bot uses your messages to add 🍅 Tomatoes to your balance

fields.title: Direct messages
fields.description: The functionality of DMs is limited to `->help` and `->invite` (for bot invites). Please, use server bot chats for full bot functionality

title: About store
description:
Command is not available.
This function will be available after v2.0

title: About tagging
description:
Command is not available.
This function will be available after v1.9.x

title: About bot invitation
description: You can add Amusement Club on any other server, but you have to register this server in bot database first. Type `->invite [your server id]` and it will be added for 20 hours. If you won't invite bot within that time, link will not be active.

fields.title: READ THIS
fields.description:
Bot constantly reads and **logs** all the messages on server in order to give Tomatoes and debug purposes. Feel free to exclude bot from ANY channels, that you want to secure contents of. However, keep in mind, that bot **won't read** messages in those channels, so you won't get Tomatoes from them.
**Messages in Logs** can be used by **bot administration** to find bugs/errors and cheaters. Make sure that bot is **not** present in channels, that may contain any **confidential** information

fields.title: Bot administration and disclaimers
fields.description:
Administration will **never** use information in logs for personal purposes. However, [disclaimer] administration is **NOT RESPONSIBLE** for consequences of you or any Member of server/guild including sensible/confidential information.
Administration will **never ask** you about your *discord password* or *administrative permissions* for your server.
[disclaimer] All information used by bot is in **public chat** and can be accessed by **any** member of the guild/server. If you invite bot to private server, consider that **administration** can see and read the messages

fields.title: Server administration
fields.description: **Please note**, that bot can be invited only by users, that have permission to invite bots to server. If you are NOT target server administrator, send *generated link* to administrator or any person with corresponding role

fields.title: Any questions?
fields.description: If you have any questions regarding bot, please ask them [in bot discord](https://discord.gg/kqgAvdX)

fields.title: Ready to invite?
fields.description:
Please, run `->invite [server id]` to register your server. If you won't register your server, bot **will not** work!
**PLEASE NOTE**: After you run this command, your *discord name* will be visible to anyone else, who decides to invite this bot to the same server

title: About auctions
description: You can add cards to the auctions market or bid for an auction.

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
You can combine any filters in any order. If no auction found, bot will tell you that.
Auction IDs can be found using the `->auctions` command (ie. `xxxxxx`).
